name: VirtualScroller
description: VirtualScroller is a performant approach to handle huge data efficiently.

properties.name: appendOnly
properties.description: Used to append each loaded item to top without removing any items from the DOM. Using very large data may cause the browser to crash.

properties.name: autoSize
properties.description: Whether to dynamically change the height or width of scrollable container.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Style class of the component.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Columns of the virtual scroller for vertical option.

properties.name: contentTemplate
properties.description: The template of item's wrapper element.

properties.name: delay
properties.description: Delay in scroll before new data is loaded.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If disabled, the VirtualScroller feature is eliminated and the content is displayed directly.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.name: inline
properties.description: When enabled, positions the content as inline.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array of objects to display.

properties.name: itemSize
properties.description: The height/width of item according to orientation.

properties.name: itemTemplate
properties.description: The template of item.

properties.name: lazy
properties.description: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.

properties.name: loaderDisabled
properties.description: Used to implement a custom loader instead of using the loader feature in the VirtualScroller.

properties.name: loaderIconTemplate
properties.description: The template of loader's icon.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Whether the data is loaded.

properties.name: loadingIcon
properties.description: The icon to show while indicating data load is in progress.

properties.name: loadingTemplate
properties.description: The template of loader.

properties.name: numToleratedItems
properties.description: Determines how many additional elements to add to the DOM outside of the view. According to the scrolls made up and down, extra items are added in a certain algorithm in the form of multiples of this number. Default value is half the number of items shown in the view.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The orientation of scrollbar, valid values are 'vertical', 'horizontal' and 'both'.

properties.name: pt
properties.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

properties.name: ptOptions
properties.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

properties.name: resizeDelay
properties.description: Delay after window's resize finishes.

properties.name: scrollHeight
properties.description: Height of the scroll viewport.

properties.name: scrollWidth
properties.description: Width of the scroll viewport.

properties.name: showLoader
properties.description: Whether to show loader.

properties.name: showSpacer
properties.description: Used to implement a custom spacer instead of using the spacer feature in the VirtualScroller.

properties.name: step
properties.description: Used to specify how many items to load in each load method in lazy mode.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Inline style of the component.

properties.name: tabIndex
properties.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

callbacks.name: onLazyLoad
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke in lazy mode to load new data.

callbacks.name: onScroll
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when scroll position changes.

callbacks.name: onScrollIndexChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when scroll position and item's range in view changes.

methods.name: getElementRef
methods.description: Returns the reference of virtualScroller's container.

methods.name: getRenderedRange
methods.description: Returns the range of items added to the DOM.

methods.name: scrollInView
methods.description: It is used to move the specified index into the view. It is a method that will usually be needed when keyboard support is added to the virtualScroller component.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of item according to orientation mode.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Defines the location of the item in view, valid values are 'to-start' and 'to-end'.

parameters.name: behavior
parameters.description: Behavior of scroll, valid values are 'auto' and 'smooth'

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll to move to a specific position.

methods.name: scrollToIndex
methods.description: Scroll to move to a specific item.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of item according to orientation mode.

parameters.name: behavior
parameters.description: Behavior of scroll, valid values are 'auto' and 'smooth'
